channel.title: Raspberry Pi on Yak Shaving
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry Pi on Yak Shaving

item.title: Jumper Wires
item.description: Jumper wires are as simple as the name suggests; they are wires that end with pins, enabling them to connect two points without having a lot of soldering overhead. Jumper wires are conventionally used with breadboards and other prototyping tools to make changes to the circuit as a joy.

item.title: On Switching From Mac to RaspberryPi
item.description: A photo-journalist based in West Yorkshire Peter Garner recently replaced his Mac mini with a Raspberry Pi, and he’s got some interesting insights into the process.
